title: Super POTUS!
description: The President of the United States (POTUS) wakes up one morning to discover he truly is the most powerful man in the world—not because he is President, but because he now has super powers!  After a series of wacky experiments involving a treadmill, a baseball bat, and a flamethrower, the President flies into action to protect the innocent—including his own family!  ---- SUPER POTUS! is written for middle grade readers, but this hilarious adventure will thrill kids and parents alike.
author: Robert Herzfeld
